content.text:
# Major League Baseball Executive of the Year Award

The MLB Executive of the Year Award was established by Major League Baseball (MLB) after the  season. The award is given annually to one executive, including general managers, in MLB. It is voted on by all 30 MLB teams, before the postseason. The inaugural winner was Billy Beane of the Oakland Athletics.
The baseball executives chosen as recipients of the MLB Executive of the Year Award are listed below in chronological order.
Award winners
